system.description: Effect: The user Dynamaxes. The user may only use Action within 20m of their partner that possesses a Wishing Star. If user is in an area with abundant Galar particles (or similar), they may use this Action without spending PP.

actions.name: Become Giant!
actions.description: Effect: The user Dynamaxes. The user may only use Action within 20m of their partner that possesses a Wishing Star. If user is in an area with abundant Galar particles (or similar), they may use this Action without spending PP.
